test: lakhota ki hipi čha hokšila ki wakte ną matho ki hi
The Indians killed the boy, and the bear came.
yahi čha ną lakhota ki wakte
You came and killed the Indian.
wičhaša ki hipi čha ną nikte
The people came, and someone killed them
wahi čha lakhota ki matho ki wičhačhopi
You came, and the bears called the Indian.
The person killed someone, and I called the bear.
The person killed someone, and the bear called me.
